amendment.description: Pursuant to the unanimous consent request, H.Res. 614 is amended by striking the last sentence in the first section of the resolution and inserting "All points of order against provisions in the bill are waived.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Reschenthaler amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
On agreeing to the Reschenthaler amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.

action.text: House amendment considered as adopted: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Reschenthaler.
